actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to compile and keep current a mineral fuel reserves inventory.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to compile and keep current, on not less than an annual basis, an inventory of all mineral fuel reserves containing hydrocarbons and uranium in the public domain lands of the United States, together with other natural resources which are current or potential energy sources.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to compile and keep current a mineral fuel reserves inventory.
